meanings.sent1: When I accidentally burned my mouth, the hot soup uvulitises my uvula.

meanings.definition: Causes inflammation or swelling of the uvula.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed me with uvulitises after examining my swollen uvula.
meanings.sent2: Uvulitises can make it difficult to swallow or speak properly.
meanings.sent3: The uvulitises in my throat made me sound like a frog when I tried to talk.
meanings.sent4: The uvulitises in the back of my throat felt like a small balloon ready to pop.
